sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { decrementQuantity, incrementQuantity, removeItem } from '../../store/CartSlice'; import style from './SideBar.module.scss' export default function SideBar({isOpen,setIsOpen}) { const {cart}=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const close = () => { setIsOpen(false); }; return ( <>
Shopping Cart 0
{cart.map((item) => ( <>
{item.name}
- {item.quantity} dispatch(decrementQuantity(item.id))} > +
dispatch(removeItem(item.id))} > {item.price} $
))}
View Cart
) }
